metadata.title: CVE-2024-26651 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: sr9800:Add check for usbnet_get_endpoints Add check for usbnet_get_endpoints() andreturn the error if it fails in order to transfer the error.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.4.0-259.293').
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-229.241~16.04.1').
linux-kvm package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.4.0-1137.147').
linux-aws package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.4.0-1174.189').
linux-aws-hwe package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-1173.186~16.04.1').
linux-azure package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-1181.196~16.04.1').
linux-gcp package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-1166.183~16.04.1').
linux-oracle package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-1135.146~16.04.1').
